page.title: 03TRANSPORT IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The railway lines were closed in the l960s and the nearest mainline station is at Brough (l2 miles). Public Transport is provided by East Yorkshire Motor Services Ltd., who run scheduled services from Hull via Market Weighton and Shiptonthorpe, to York and Leeds. There is a weekday service of 10 buses a day in each direction with a reduced service on Sundays. A local coach firm provides tours and excursions to places of interest in the summer, and, together with a newer firm, have a number of coaches and mini buses available for contract work and private hire. The road haulage industry is well represented in the area, mainly providing bulk transporters and cattle trucks.
